g.text: ora from the southwestern United States and North of
Mexico so desert species are outstanding repositories of past climate changes; (3) the most
decisive climate variables in deserts are related to temperature and precipitation,
understanding future changes in both gives insights whether plants will be capable of
adaptation to changes in these climate variables.
